type: Legendary Creature – Human Knight Lord Noble
rules_text:
Trample
[i]Blazing Knight[/i] – Whenever a creature you control enters, you may create a Young Hero Role token attached to that creature. [i](If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature has “Whenever this creature attacks, if its toughness is 3 or less, put a +1/+1 counter on it.”)[/i]
[i]Durandal[/i] – Whenever an enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
Partner with Hector, Marques of Ostia
